entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sept-Îles
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
